items.text: The seed slips out of your arms. You scrabble desperately for it, but it rolls away from your straining fingers and tumbles into a nearby crevice, vanishing into the darkness below. You suddenly feel a shooting pain spear through your head. You howl in agony, desperately clutching your skull … then in a moment, the pain is gone. You stand there, confused. Why were you carrying this strange seed around? What was so important about it?
The Ranger with the Seed within reach suffers 1 injury. Then, discard the Seed.
